name: Cole Dingo's Vtuber Blackjack
description:
Time is money so I'll cut to the chase. You like streaming? you like blackjack? well then do I have the game for you! Cole Dingo's Vtuber BlackJack is a game where you can play blackjack on stream with your audience with you taking the role as the dealer!

Don't understand what I'm talking about? Check out the link to the demo stream below (Hopefully it's up right now eheheh)

Using OBS and Twitch integration, you can make this game into a twitch overlay to play blackjack with your chat, Players enter their messages via twitch chat commands, so they don't need to download anything to participate!

Players compete against each other AND you, the game has a small internal economy and money that you use will be recorded, and if you're unlucky chat may bankrupt you!! turning the experience into a bit of a community effort.

Don't actually want to pay attention to the game and just let it run while you do other things? That's fine, the game includes and auto-play feature that will activate dealer commands without any input from you.

A cheap and fun game that will create a fun new experience for your fans while you rack up that sweet sweet viewer engagement!! That's Cole Dingo's Vtuber Blackjack!!
